attributes.title: App difficulties
attributes.review: The app made my phone slow as well as making it crash.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: give us TikTok back you dumb orange. how petty do you have to be to take away an app that is pretty much the only thing that gives gen z happiness

attributes.title: Trump is a Ra*ist *C or P
attributes.review: I hated this app, totally culty and disgusting. Why any person in their right mind would decide to voluntarily support someone in favor of stripping away American citizens rights is mind boggling to me. They’re absolutely stupid 🥰
DO NOT recommend this app. it’s helps and benefits our terrible president and we do not want that. also we need to show him who’s boss and take his app down >:)

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: I wanted to keep up with current events without the stupidity of Trumps Twitter, but sadly the app crashes a lot and is overall not helpful. :) ✨🧚🏻

attributes.title: Trump eats hamsters!
attributes.review: Do not get this app!!! Its just pictures of Donald Trump eating hamsters! Yes you read correctly. Donald Trump is a part of something known as the Lite State. A ritual of this conspiring group is to eat a hamster every week. Disgusting!!!

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: I’ve downloaded apps, many apps ! I download apps all the time, and this one is not a very good one. You know apps are supposed to be good, fun, however this app is not that.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS CURSED!!!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what it was about and when i did my car got sent on fire, i had a miscarriage, my dog died, and i’m now homeless, oh and my fish ran away!!!

attributes.title: UTTER GARBAGE
attributes.review: as soon as i got the app i hadn’t even finished putting in my information and the secret service BUSTED DOWN MY DOOR and BODYSLAMED my cat. it was VERY unpleasant to see and they ate my grandmothers ashes right after!!! this is a terrible app!!NEVER GET THIS BS!!

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Trump is trash so that should be the first thing but also why does anyone want an app abt trump like I don’t want a Cheeto on my phone. Rate 1 star guys we all know it’s trash.
